text:
both directions (Bidirectional LSTM). Interestingly, the LSTM predicts an activity for each
input time step of a subsequence of sensor data, which are then aggregated in order to predict
an activity for the window.
There will [be] a score for each time step predicting the type of activity occurring at
time t. The prediction for the entire window T is obtained by merging the individual
scores into a single prediction
